title: Meastro Erro
body: I am trying to play online with my friend. It is telling me "League of Legends has lost contact with Maestro. League of Legends will now exit. Please try restarting the client." I have know idea what to do i am trying to restart every thing. I have tried restarting league, my laptop, and my wifi. plz help.

replies.body:
Maestro is a pretty important service that helps you stay connected to our servers. If you're disconnecting from it, chances are, there are some issues between your PC and our servers. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so you can ensure that your network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
I have done what you told me and I still got the error. Do you have any thing more I can do?
i'm still not able to play the game. In the task log says that i need admin privileges

Go into the HRT's install locale **(C:\Program Files (x86)\Hextech Repair Tool)** and launch the *Hextech Repair Tool.exe* file as admin. Just right-click on it and choose *run as administrator*. Let me know if this worked!

I have tried some more treys and updating and upgrading and some restarts, now it will not open after the launch "page". It won't go to the sign in "page" i know it's not the maestro error but i don't know anyone else.
please help
